title: Kristin Has *What* Disease?!
description:
It’s no secret that schools, especially daycares, are breeding grounds for germs. When you send your kids to school you can almost be certain that they will eventually come home with a sickness of some sort.
Today, Kristin worked remotely because unfortunately, Baby Jimmy came down with hand, foot, mouth disease.
Learn more about your ad choices. Visit megaphone.fm/adchoices
